hero.title: AI-Powered Automation for SMEs
hero.subtitle: Save costs, optimize processes, and unlock your team's potential with smart solutions tailored to your business.
hero.impact: Fewer manual tasks, more growth. That's our promise.

benefits.title: Why choose NovaPage?
benefits.customDesc: Our AI solutions are not generic. We analyze your operations to create a unique tool that solves your specific problems.
benefits.aiTitle: The Engine: Automation with AI and Efficiency
benefits.aiDesc: We implement intelligent solutions that work for you, reducing operational costs and freeing up your team to focus on growth.
benefits.secureTitle: The Foundation: Secure and Scalable Infrastructure
benefits.secureDesc: Every automation solution is built on a robust cloud architecture, ensuring your operation is secure and ready to grow.

about.title: Who we are
about.description: NovaPage is a digital studio specializing in process automation and AI solutions for SMEs, supported by deep expertise in custom software development and cloud architectures. We were born in Colombia and operate remotely for companies of any size seeking innovation, security, and results.
about.founder: Founded by César Pérez, a software Developer passionate about efficient and secure technology.

projects.title: Our recent work
projects.intro: We have implemented intelligent solutions that transform our collaborators' operations, always focusing on automation, efficiency, and measurable business impact.
projects.privacy: Some success stories are not shown due to confidentiality agreements, but we can share details in a personalized meeting.

list.name: Trading Education Platform
list.description: We created a specialized trading course platform, modern and scalable, with a smooth user experience. It includes secure authentication and detailed progress tracking, completely automating educational management and premium access administration.
bullets: Comprehensive authentication system and role-based access.
User progress tracking in each module or video.
Optimized learning experience adapted to modern devices.

list.name: Evana – Intelligent Family Assistant
list.description: We led the design and development of an intelligent agent system capable of automating complex tasks and providing advanced support to families and organizations. Includes modular orchestration, robust backend, and serverless tools for greater efficiency and scalability.
bullets: Integration of cloud services and professional version control.

list.name: Confidential Projects
list.description: We have contributed to strategic initiatives for technology and automation companies. Due to confidentiality agreements, we do not show details publicly, but we are ready to share our experience in a personalized meeting.
bullets: Transparency and trust in every collaboration.

cta.title: Ready to automate the future of your company?
cta.subtitle: At NovaPage, we support you every step of the way.

hero.title: Intelligent Automation
hero.subtitle: We design and implement the technology that optimizes your operations, saves costs, and gives you a competitive edge in the market.

web.title: Web Platforms and Applications (Our Technical Base)
web.desc: Boost your business with custom-designed websites and apps: fast, secure, and ready to scale. We solve everything from your digital presence to internal process management.

automation.title: Intelligent Process Automation (RPA & AI)
automation.desc: Save time and eliminate errors by automating repetitive or complex tasks. Digitize key processes and make your operation more agile and scalable, regardless of your company's size.

ai.title: Digital Assistants and AI-Powered Systems
ai.desc: Transform customer service and decision-making with AI tailored to your business. We integrate chatbots, assistants, and intelligent systems to automate and anticipate needs.

cloud.title: Cloud Infrastructure and Security (Our Support)
cloud.desc: Modernize your company by migrating to the cloud securely and efficiently. We optimize your infrastructure and control costs so your systems are flexible, secure, and always available.

web.title: Web and App Development
web.intro: For an automation or AI solution to be useful, it needs a robust, secure, and user-friendly interface. At NovaPage, we build the platforms and applications that serve as the foundation for our intelligent solutions, ensuring an exceptional user experience and full control over your new automated operations.

sections.title: What can we build for you?

items.title: Corporate and institutional websites
items.desc: Showcase your company or business to the world with modern, fast pages, optimized for Google and fully mobile-friendly. Perfect for those needing a professional and reliable online presence, without complications.

items.title: E-commerce and online stores
items.desc: Sell products or services online with total security and easy management. We include catalogs, payment gateways, reports, and integrated marketing tools.

items.title: Landing pages and microsites
items.desc: Ideal for campaigns, events, launches, or promotions. Developed in record time, adapted to any brand image, and ready to capture clients from day one.

items.title: Enterprise platforms and systems
items.desc: We create internal portals, management systems, custom dashboards, and complex applications integrated with your processes and databases. Automate tasks, improve collaboration, and gain full visibility of your operations.

items.title: Advanced and Progressive Web Applications (PWA)
items.desc: Custom, scalable solutions ready to grow. We integrate smart features, notifications, offline access, APIs, and more. Connect your web with external systems like ERPs, CRMs, cloud services, and AI tools.

items.title: Personalized initial diagnosis
items.desc: We listen to your goals and needs, analyze your business context, and propose the best technical and visual solution, always adjusted to your budget.

items.title: User-centered UI/UX design
items.desc: We create intuitive, attractive interfaces aligned with your brand identity, always focusing on the best experience for your client or end user.

items.title: Agile development with leading technologies
items.desc: We work with modern tools like React, Next.js, TypeScript, Python/FastAPI, TailwindCSS, Supabase, Azure, and more. This ensures speed, security, and easy maintenance.

items.title: Custom integrations
items.desc: We connect your web or app with payment systems, social networks, WhatsApp, databases, ERPs, CRMs, or any key tool for your operations. Everything works within a single digital ecosystem.

items.title: Optimization and thorough testing
items.desc: Every project goes through technical and real-world experience testing on multiple devices and browsers, ensuring speed, security, and maximum compatibility.

items.title: Secure deployment and support
items.desc: We handle the launch in the cloud, high-performance servers, or your preferred provider. We offer hosting and maintenance options to keep your project always secure, updated, and backed up.

items.title: 100% tailored solutions
items.desc: We adapt to any need, from small projects to complex enterprise systems.

items.title: Fast delivery and proven results
items.desc: You can have your web or app ready in days or weeks, depending on the scope.

items.title: Genuine guidance
items.desc: We don't just develop; we advise and guide you every step. If you wish, we support you with ongoing support, enhancements, and future improvements.

items.title: Total flexibility
items.desc: Choose only what you need: development, hosting, maintenance, or the full package. We adapt to your budget and growth stage.

web.cta: Ready to digitalize your business, attract more clients, or automate processes with a custom website or app?

automation.title: Process Automation and RPA
automation.intro: At NovaPage, we take your business efficiency to the next level by digitizing and automating time-consuming, resource-intensive, or error-prone tasks. Our mission is to let your team focus on what truly matters, leaving repetitive tasks to technology.

sections.title: What do we do in automation?

items.title: Identification of key processes
items.desc: We analyze with you the workflows and tasks that can be automated, from simple everyday activities to complex operational processes.

items.title: Design and implementation of automated flows
items.desc: We create custom solutions using leading automation and RPA (Robotic Process Automation) tools like n8n, Make, Power Automate, or custom development tailored to your context.

items.title: Automation for all levels
items.desc: From small businesses to large organizations: we implement auto-responses, data updates, bots, scripts, and integrated systems connecting platforms like ERP, CRM, web, email, social networks, and more.

items.title: Total integration
items.desc: Our solutions connect with your existing systems (APIs, databases, spreadsheets, cloud apps) and can scale as your needs grow.

items.title: Real savings and error reduction
items.desc: Minimize manual work, avoid duplicate tasks, reduce human error risk, and speed up results delivery, no matter the information volume.

sections.title: How do we work at NovaPage?

items.title: Opportunity diagnosis
items.desc: We help you map out repetitive or critical processes, identifying where automation brings the greatest value and ROI.

items.title: Solution design and validation
items.desc: We propose clear workflows, prototype them, and show you how they will work before implementation.

items.title: Agile and scalable implementation
items.desc: We configure, program, and connect each part of the process, ensuring stable and secure automation.

items.title: Training and support
items.desc: If you wish, we train your team to fully leverage automation. We also offer support, ongoing evolution, and monitoring of implemented bots and flows.

items.title: Email and message processing
items.desc: Automate the reception, classification, response, and archiving of emails and messages across various channels. Reduce management time and ensure nothing important is overlooked.

items.title: Data entry and update
items.desc: Eliminate manual work in entering and updating information in databases, spreadsheets, or business systems. Ensure precision and always up-to-date data.

items.title: Automatic report generation
items.desc: Get sales, inventory, business metrics, or any key indicator reports periodically and without manual intervention. Instantly visualize results and make informed decisions.

items.title: System integration
items.desc: Synchronize information between ERP, CRM, web platforms, payment tools, and other systems. Ensure all your processes are connected and information flows seamlessly.

items.title: Automated client responses
items.desc: Provide immediate and personalized attention to your clients via email, WhatsApp, chat, or social networks. Improve user experience and save your support team's time.

items.title: Document sending and archiving
items.desc: Automate the sending, organization, and storage of documents like invoices, contracts, or receipts, complying with traceability standards and facilitating information access.

items.title: Notifications, reminders, and recurring tasks
items.desc: Schedule alerts, reminders, and periodic execution of administrative tasks, ensuring deadlines are met and greater control over your internal processes.

items.title: Accessible solutions
items.desc: From simple flows to enterprise-level RPA, for any business size.

items.title: Scalable automation
items.desc: Start with the basics and evolve to more complex processes as your business requires.

items.title: Barrier-free technology
items.desc: We use visual tools (low-code/no-code) and custom development, depending on what best fits your case.

items.title: Comprehensive support
items.desc: We guide you through the change, provide support, and help you continuously optimize your processes.

automation.cta: Ready to automate and transform your business?

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence Solutions and Digital Assistants
ai.intro: At NovaPage, we help companies and teams of all sizes incorporate artificial intelligence into their operations, processes, and customer channels. We bring AI within your business's reach: from basic virtual assistants to intelligent automation systems capable of transforming how you work, serve customers, or make decisions.
ai.desc: Integrate artificial intelligence and digital assistants to improve efficiency, personalize attention, and make better decisions. From chatbots to advanced data analysis, we bring AI to the heart of your processes.

items.title: Custom Virtual Assistants
items.desc: We create chatbots and digital assistants for websites, WhatsApp, social networks, and internal channels. They handle frequent queries, manage bookings, collect information, and offer 24/7 support, freeing your team from repetitive tasks and improving your customers' experience.

items.title: Automation and Smart Copilots
items.desc: We develop systems that use AI to automate complex tasks: report generation, text and document analysis, automatic classification, recommendations, and more. Copilots help you anticipate needs, suggest actions, and optimize operations.

items.title: Specialized Agents for Business Processes
items.desc: We implement intelligent agents that collaborate to manage processes in areas like HR, sales, finance, or customer service. They automate email management, workflows, and key metric monitoring, enabling you to scale operations without growing your team.

items.title: Integration with Next-Gen Models
items.desc: We integrate leading models like OpenAI (GPT), Gemini, custom copilots, and agent platforms such as Autogen, CrewAI, or Langchain, so you access natural conversation, prediction, and advanced automation capabilities tailored to your needs.

items.title: Smart Document and Data Processing
items.desc: We automate the extraction and analysis of information from large volumes of documents and data. We create solutions that summarize texts, identify sentiment, detect trends, and enable smart search, saving time and improving decision-making.

items.title: Companies looking to scale customer service
items.desc: Businesses that want to offer fast, consistent, 24/7 support without relying on more human staff.

items.title: Teams wanting to automate processes
items.desc: Organizations seeking to optimize information analysis, speed up internal tasks, or innovate how they operate.

items.title: Startups and growing businesses
items.desc: Entrepreneurs looking for accessible solutions to experiment with AI, get fast results, and maximize ROI.

items.title: AI opportunity diagnosis
items.desc: We analyze your processes to identify where AI can add value, save resources, and generate tangible impact.

items.title: Solution design and training
items.desc: We define the conversational flow, train models, and configure the logic of assistants or agents, adapting them to your data and context.

items.title: Implementation and integration
items.desc: We deploy the solution on the channels you need (web, WhatsApp, CRM, email, etc.) and ensure proper interaction with your systems.

items.title: Monitoring, optimization, and evolution
items.desc: We monitor performance, adjust models, and support you to improve and scale the solution as your needs grow.

items.title: Solutions tailored to you
items.desc: We adapt AI to your digital maturity, from simple pilots to complex enterprise systems.

items.title: Cutting-edge technology
items.desc: We use the most advanced models and platforms to guarantee innovative, sustainable results.

items.title: Expert and transparent support
items.desc: We guide you every step, explaining without jargon and adapting the solution to your goals.

items.title: Scalability and flexibility
items.desc: You can start simply and evolve toward intelligent solutions that grow with you and your business.

ai.cta: Ready to take your company into the future?

cloud.title: Cloud Consulting and Migration
cloud.intro: Automation and AI require a solid, secure, and scalable foundation to operate. We specialize in designing and implementing the perfect cloud infrastructure to support your intelligent solutions, ensuring maximum availability, data security, and cost efficiency.
cloud.desc: Modernize your infrastructure and leverage the cloud's flexibility and scalability with an expert partner. We manage the entire process so your business grows securely and efficiently.

items.title: Personalized diagnosis and analysis
items.desc: We analyze your current infrastructure in depth, identifying opportunities for improvement, technical risks, limitations, and scalability potential. We assess costs, security, performance, and compatibility with cloud platforms.

items.title: Tailored cloud strategy definition
items.desc: We design the best route to migrate or evolve your infrastructure, considering full or partial migration, adoption of serverless services, secure storage, modern databases like Cosmos DB or Supabase, microservices, and APIs.

items.title: Safe and planned migration plan
items.desc: We create a detailed, staged roadmap to transfer systems and data with minimal risk and maximum operational continuity, applying controls and backups at every step.

items.title: Implementation and execution
items.desc: We carry out the technical migration: data transfer, cloud environment setup (Azure, Supabase, VPS, etc.), app optimization, and go-live. We include integration with automation, monitoring, and backup tools.

items.title: Continuous optimization and support
items.desc: After migration, we improve your infrastructure's efficiency and security to reduce operational costs and ensure stability. We offer support, maintenance, and ongoing evolution adapted to your business.

items.title: Training and guidance
items.desc: We train your team to make the most of new technologies and facilitate the transition to the cloud, ensuring a productive, seamless process.

items.title: Companies managing local or traditional systems
items.desc: Businesses wanting to migrate from physical or on-premises infrastructure to the cloud to gain flexibility and efficiency.

items.title: Businesses needing to scale and improve security
items.desc: Organizations needing to grow quickly without sacrificing data and operations protection.

items.title: Organizations looking to reduce costs and automate processes
items.desc: Companies seeking to optimize their infrastructure for greater agility and less dependence on manual processes.

items.title: Companies already using the cloud who want to optimize or modernize
items.desc: Businesses aiming to improve their cloud architecture for better performance, security, and scalability.

items.title: Expert and close guidance
items.desc: We guide you from the initial analysis to go-live and ongoing support, accompanying you every step.

items.title: Focus on security and performance
items.desc: We prioritize data protection and operational efficiency to minimize risks and maximize benefits.

items.title: Solutions tailored to every need
items.desc: We offer everything from targeted support to comprehensive migration and optimization projects, depending on what your business requires.

items.title: Cutting-edge technology
items.desc: We work with leading providers and apply best industry practices to ensure reliable results.

cloud.cta: Ready to move to the cloud and boost your business? Let’s talk and create your company’s future today!

hero.title: Featured Projects
hero.subtitle: Explore how we have applied intelligent automation and custom development to solve real business problems and drive operational efficiency.
hero.imgAlt: Portfolio of technology projects, web applications, and AI solutions developed by NovaPage

projNakamototrading.name: Full-Stack Web Platform with Advanced Authentication and Analytics (Nakamototrading)
projNakamototrading.description: Comprehensive development of a responsive web platform with Next.js and an internal API for key functions. Includes a secure signup/login system managed with Supabase Auth, user metric tracking in Supabase Database, and a CDN for efficient content distribution.
bullets: Building modern and scalable web applications.
Implementation of secure authentication and robust user flows.
Optimization of performance and user experience.

projEvana.name: Evana – Smart Family Assistant (AI Agent System)
projEvana.description: Design and implementation of a modular architecture for an intelligent agent system (Autogen) capable of supporting complex tasks. Includes a FastAPI backend for the API, Azure Functions as serverless external tools for the agents, and an Angular frontend (in development). This system demonstrates advanced AI orchestration for task automation and intelligent support.
bullets: Design of complex systems based on AI agents.
Development of scalable and secure backend.
Advanced integration of serverless services as tools for AI.
Professional version control and environment management.

header.name: CESAR PEREZ
header.role: Mid-Level Software Developer | Cloud Development & AI Automation Specialist

summary.title: Professional Summary
summary.paragraph: Mid-Level Software Developer and Cloud Solutions Architect with a strong background in designing and implementing scalable and secure architectures on Microsoft Azure. Expert in Full-Stack development (React, Next.js, Python/FastAPI), building systems with advanced enterprise authentication (Microsoft Entra ID), and API optimization. Pioneer in process automation and Artificial Intelligence application, using advanced tools for autonomous code creation, testing and correction, as well as copilot-based solutions. My self-taught approach and commitment to DevOps practices (GitFlow, CI/CD) allow me to transform complex challenges into efficient, robust solutions. I am driven by innovation and a constant search for strategic value through technology.

cloud.title: Cloud Computing & DevOps
cloud.point1: Microsoft Azure (Azure Functions, Service Bus, Cosmos DB, domain and DNS management)
cloud.point4: Environment and resource management, monitoring (UptimeRobot, Mixpanel)

ai.title: AI & Automation
ai.point2: Automation with Make.com, n8n and Power Automate
ai.point3: Copilot and LLM assistant development (GPTs, Gemini, OpenAI)
ai.point4: Document processing and vectorization (downloads, extraction, indexing)
ai.point5: Code scaffolding and automatic testing with AI

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.point2: RESTful API design: pagination, security, documentation (Swagger)
backend.point3: Custom middlewares, token validation and refresh
backend.point4: Clean Architecture patterns (Router, Service, Repository, Client, Mapper)
backend.point5: Messaging: Azure Service Bus, SQS, topic patterns

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.point2: Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, dynamic layouts, i18n

database.title: Databases
database.point1: Cosmos DB: advanced NoSQL modeling, denormalization, embedding
database.point4: Redis usage and Singleton patterns for cache and performance

security.title: Security & Authentication
security.point1: Microsoft Entra ID/Azure AD: JWT, Scopes, redirections, SSO
security.point2: Row-level Security, role and permission management (Supabase/Azure)
security.point3: OAuth 2.0, OpenID Connect, header centralization in middleware
security.point4: Error testing and documentation, endpoint protection

architecture.title: Architecture & Code Quality
architecture.point1: Clean Architecture patterns, DTOs, DAOs, Mappers
architecture.point2: Separation and modular organization by entity
architecture.point3: Test-Driven Development (TDD), unit and integration testing
architecture.point4: Custom error management, logs, and best practices (PEP8, English)

job1.point1: Technical leadership in the design and implementation of scalable, secure architectures on Microsoft Azure (Functions, Cosmos DB, Service Bus, serverless resources).
job1.point2: Full-Stack development with Next.js, React, and Python/FastAPI, integrating automation workflows and intelligent data processing.
job1.point3: Orchestration of multi-agent systems and advanced integration of generative AI (OpenAI, Copilot, n8n, RPA, CrewAI) for optimization of internal processes and customer services.
job1.point4: Continuous improvement and implementation of CI/CD pipelines in Azure DevOps, automating validations, deployments, and monitoring.
job1.point5: Advanced enterprise authentication management and granular access control using Microsoft Entra ID, including security policies and protection of critical endpoints.
job1.point6: Rigorous application of Clean Architecture, TDD, observability (logs, traceability), and continuous refactoring to ensure code quality and maintainability.
job1.point7: Training, support, and mentoring to development teams in modern practices of AI, automation, and cloud, facilitating the adoption of new technologies.

job2.point1: Execution of Full-Stack web development projects using Next.js and Angular for modern, highly interactive applications.
job2.point2: Design and construction of relational and NoSQL databases, as well as integration of robust authentication and authorization systems using Supabase (Auth and Database).
job2.point3: Implementation of RESTful APIs and efficient management of states, data flows, and business logic on both frontend and backend.
job2.point4: Direct collaboration with clients for requirements gathering, MVP definition, and delivery of functional products under agile methodologies.
job2.point5: Deployment and maintenance of solutions, focusing on performance, scalability, and user experience.
job2.point6: Application of unit testing, version management (Git), and continuous integration workflows to ensure deliverable quality.
job2.point7: Development of responsive, accessible interfaces, visual experience design, and optimization of flows for mobile and desktop devices.

job3.point1: Development and optimization of advanced features in Vue.js and Nuxt.js for high-impact applications.
job3.point2: Translation of mockups and prototypes in Canva into functional interfaces, ensuring design coherence and usability.
job3.point3: Preparation of SQL queries and analytical reports in Excel for business decision-making.
job3.point4: Proactive management of IT incidents and comprehensive technical support to ensure system availability and operational continuity.

job4.point1: Development of a web platform for campaign statistics visualization using Angular and Laravel, with data integration in Firebase.
job4.point2: Design, editing, and publishing of visual resources and communication manuals for social networks and internal use.

job5.point1: Management and operation of professional photography and video equipment for corporate content production and events.
job5.point2: Editing, post-production, and delivery of high-quality audiovisual material using Photoshop, Premiere, and After Effects.

proj1.description: Comprehensive development of a responsive web platform with Next.js and internal API for key functions. Includes a secure registration/login system managed with Supabase Auth, user metrics tracking in Supabase Database, and a CDN for efficient content delivery.
proj1.achievement1: Building modern and scalable web applications.
proj1.achievement2: Implementation of secure authentication and robust user flows.

proj2.name: Evana - Intelligent Family Assistant (AI Agent System)

Includes a FastAPI backend for the API, Azure Functions as serverless external tools for agents, and an Angular frontend (in development). This system demonstrates advanced AI orchestration for task automation and intelligent support.
proj2.achievement1: Design of complex agent-based AI systems.
proj2.achievement2: Development of scalable and secure backend.
proj2.achievement3: Advanced integration of serverless services as tools for AI.
